snippet.title: Vertical Kingdom - Official Teaser Trailer | Publisher Spotlights Showcase 2023 (Freedom Games)
snippet.description: Here’s a look at Vertical Kingdom in this trailer for the upcoming card-based city-builder roguelite game. In Vertical Kingdom, due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.
